short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds useful enhancements to the Gitlab UI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes Gitlab issue boards a little more convenient to use by adding these features:

1. Issue cards show which users have already approved and are currently reviewing the related merge request
2. Opening the related MR of an issue with a single click from the board by clicking on the approval info
